content.content: Dear all, I see from EIP-1 (figure), one of the state transitions from ‘idea’ to ‘final’ includes Idea->Draft->Review<->Last call->Final Curious on who judges the last leg above and how  this process is implemented for core EIPs and Meta EIPs?  I.e., from Last call to Final. For e.g., Is it decided by a vote if the EIP gets to final? Thank you.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is asking a question about the EIP-1 process, specifically about the transition from "Last call" to "Final" and how it is implemented for core EIPs and Meta EIPs. The post does not fit into any of the other listed topics.
